availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Greenup County, Kentucky farm laborer. Kentucky native. Married Rachel Bush Walker in 1853. Married Mary A. Walker and John Walker.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Greenup County, District 1, p. 225. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Greenup County, p. 111. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Greenup County, Precinct 2, p. 13. Scioto County, Ohio Marriages, 1851-60, Portsmouth, Ohio, accessed via Jordan Dodd, comp., _Ohio, Marriages, 1803-1900, Ancestry. “Richard D Walker (1829-1908),” Find A Grave, memorial no. 23957096, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GSln=WALK&GSpartial=1&GSbyrel=all&GSst=19&GScntry=4&GSsr=3881&GRid=23957096& (accessed June 15, 2017).
